Conversation with Cecie
My clothes are as good \n as new!
Did Syd do this \n for me?
Meow!
I guess so. I wouldn't \n have expected it of him.
My clothes are back, \n you're back. \n Things are looking up!

What do you say, 
 Dusty, should we 
 go work out the 
 kinks?
Meow!
Cecie, how do you like \n my new clothes?
Th-Those are the clothes \n we found you in when you \n first dropped here.
Yeah, they were beaten \n up pretty bad, but Syd \n mended 'em for me.
Syd did a great job \n patching them up.
Yeah, who knew he \n had it in him?
Kat, you've got an \n amazing power.

Not to mention 
 you're always so 
 positive and so 
 strong...
Thanks to you, Cecie.
Me? But I haven't done \n anything.
What are you talking \n about? You're the reason \n I got my power back.

If you hadn't found 
 Dusty and taken care of 
 him, I might never have 
 seen him again.
Meow!
Y-You're welcome, Kat. \n And you too, Dusty.

With all that flyin' and 
 fallin', you've got 
 yourself a nifty power 
 there.
And those clothes look \n right fancy. They suit \n you.
Yep, it feels like I'm \n back to my real self \n again.
Guess I should practice \n a little more to \n remember how it works.

Don't push yourself too 
 hard. Wouldn't want to 
 be sore for your mining 
 shift.
Hey, Misai! \n How's it hanging?
Don't go acting all hot \n just cause you're some \n fancy Gravity Shifter.
I'm not acting hot, but \n you've gotta admit, it \n is cool.
That's exactly what I'm \n talking about.
And that partner of \n yours...
Playing up the whole \n injury thing to get out \n of work.
He's not playing it up.
Why does Misai \n always have to \n be such a downer?
Now that I can shift gravity, it's a quick hop to the bird coop.
Wow, you made \n that all by \n yourself!?
You're so \n talented!
Mr. Syd, what did you \n do back in Hekseville?
My job? \n I was a cop.
Protecting \n and serving, \n that's me.
That's so cool! \n Did you protect the \n city with Kat?
Yep, she was a great \n assistant.
I was calling the shots, \n the brain, you might say.
Coool!
Hm?
Wow, check \n out Kat!
Yo, Kat! \n Looking good.
With the material these \n pretty ladies lent me, \n I patched your old clothes up.
So I have \n you to thank?
Tha-
Fits like a \n glove, eh?
I trimmed the \n chest for you.
Hold on! Weren't \n you supposed to be \n too hurt to move?
I got worried when \n I didn't see you \n this morning.
Oh-uh, well, \n a guy needs \n rehab, right?
So I-uh, went \n out on a walk.
So you CAN move!
If you can walk, \n you can work!
Owowow!
Oh no!
You okay?
Ugh... I must've strained \n something. You know \n how these injuries are...
To your stations!
K-Kat! \n We're leaving, \n Lisa needs you.
Do me proud, \n Gravity Queen!
Good luck, Kat!
Stop Mid-Air at the \n Designated Location
It's Cecie, wonder what she's up to?
Drop Down and Talk to Cecie
It feels great to fly again!
Stop Mid-Air at the \n Designated Location
I've got a great view up here.
Oh, it's Gawan!
Drop Down and Talk to Gawan
Maybe I should head over to the windmill boat.
It's Misai! Wonder what he'll say when he sees me now.
You're telling me you \n don't need a grav-suit?
Nope, not with Dusty.
So that thing's the \n source of your power, \n huh?
Fine then, show us what \n you can do.

Take this radio with you 
 and watch yourself, it's 
 dangerous out at the 
 mining site.
Don't worry, and I'll be \n sure to bring home a big \n haul.
Talk to Misai
Hmph, maybe I should go practice where there are no people.
Head Further Back in the Gravel \n Pit and Start Training
This looks like a good place to practice.
Head Towards the Marker
Hmm, maybe now I should try going there.
Bet I can jump across that!
Are you seriously going \n out there like that?
Yep, got a problem with \n it? Lisa already gave me \n the okay.

People who don't protect 
 themselves end up 
 dragging the rest of the 
 group down.
If you get hurt, it's \n your own fault, so don't \n go calling me for help.
I'll be fine, thanks to \n Dusty!
Just remember what I \n said about not dragging \n the rest of us down.
That should be good for now.
Revert Gravity to Normal
Yep, feels like I'm back to my old self again!
Yes
No
Replay the gravity control tutorial?
I need to find Syd and thank him for fixing my clothes!
Collect Gems on the \n Way Back to the Settlement
There's Syd!
???: \n Hey, Kat!
Don't push it, you don't \n want to go getting \n yourself injured.
I'm fine. My body feels \n lighter than ever.
Hmph, we'll see. \n The person who brings \n back the most ore wins!
It's time to show you \n why they call me the \n Mining King.
We'll start with this \n island, got it?
Got it! And just watch, \n I'll bring us back a ton \n of ore.
Goes without sayin', \n but all of the ore \n is shared here.
Lisa decides \n the bonuses, \n so no stealin'.
Yeah, yeah, I know.
Hm?
Find the Person \n Who Called You
*Beep* *Beep*
Kat here.
You're doing \n amazing work!
With my power back, \n mining's no sweat.

I'll bet even old 
 Misai is impressed 
 with your new 
 power!
Somehow I doubt \n that...
You can leave the rest \n of this island to us.
We're relying on \n you for the islands \n we can't handle.
Sure! I'll be right back \n with some ore then!
*Beep* *Beep*
Hey, we've got this \n island covered, can you \n get another one?
Got it!
Now I can really get around the settlement.
Nice!
*Beep* *Beep*
H-Help! \n Sc-Scarabs!
We're back on that \n island you just left.

I'm on my way, 
 try to stay 
 out of sight until 
 I get there.
Perfect!
Nice!
Not bad, right?
*Beep* *Beep*
You saved our butts out \n there! You're amazing.
It was nothing, just a \n few Nevi.
Nevi...?
Oh, right. You call them \n Scarabs.
Guess everyone has a \n different name for \n them.
We're okay here, you \n should go on ahead.
Right! I'll try to cover \n the hard-to-reach \n places.
And if you see Misai, \n tell him to come on \n back.

He went off where we 
 can't get a signal. 
 Haven't heard from him 
 since.
He's the best miner in \n the settlement, so I'm \n sure he's fine.
Anyway, I'll tell him to \n come back if I see him.
Though I doubt he'll \n listen to me...
Hmm, guess I'll have a look around the settlement.
Find Syd
I should try floating first.
Shift Gravity and Float
Whoa!

Was that Misai? 
 He said Scarabs... 
 If he's alone, he's 
 in deep trouble.
I heard him yell, \n so he must be close. \n I need to hurry.
Return to the Ground
One more time...
Shift Gravity and Float
Got it!
Return to the Ground
Misai! I'm here \n to help!
I don't need your \n help...
I-I can handle a few \n Scarabs.
I'm sure you could.
But how about you sit \n this one out and leave \n it to me?
Alright...
Shift Gravity and Fall \n to the Rock's Face
Okay, time to stop shifting and get back on the ground.
For a Gravity Shifter, a wall is just as good as a floor!
I wonder if I can land on that narrow spot there.
Last is up.
I'm a little nervous, but I should be okay.
I'm off my game...
Syd wasn't at the gravel pit, better look around Banga.
All hands, prepare for home.
R-Right.
Uh, about what just \n happened, I uh-
Something wrong? You're \n not acting yourself.
I just want to thank \n you.
I'm sorry about the way \n I treated you since you \n came here.
It's okay! I'm sorry I \n blew up at you too.
And you're Banga's best \n miner, right?
If it weren't for the \n Scarabs, you'd have had \n me beat.
R-Right! I'll take \n anyone on.
Let's have a rematch \n sometime.
Anytime!
Who was that? He's \n driving like a maniac!
That's Vogo... \n Trouble's comin'.
What kind of trouble?
Misai, save the \n chitchat for later! \n I need more speed.
Yes ma'am!
What's all this about \n a contract violation, \n Vogo?

We delivered 
 every last nugget 
 of gravity ore 
 specified.
*Sigh* \n Fine, let me break \n it down for you.
The fine print clearly says, \n "If any ore is deemed \n of inferior quality..."
...the first party must \n deliver its replacement \n to the second party.

And look at 
 what was mixed 
 in with the 
 last shipment! 
 Atrocious, really.

We hand check every 
 chip of ore that 
 passes into your 
 shipment.
Lest you forget, \n you signed off \n on the delivery.

Oh, sorry, you didn't 
 get the new form? 
 They changed the 
 format this year.
You accepted the deal, \n and a deal's a deal.
Clearly there's been a \n mistake, just let me talk to-

You're in no position 
 to speak with the 
 Council, you know that 
 as well as anyone.
If you want to \n survive out here, \n you need me.
And furthermore...
This stuff's \n awful...
You talk big, but we all \n know you slipped that \n bum ore in the shipment!
You, with that \n ridiculous mustache!
Oh, a new drift rat... \n Haven't had the pleasure.
Kat, \n stand down.
Fi, teach our new \n arrival some manners.
And what it means to \n disrespect Vogo Sun.
Fi!
I'm sorry, did \n I interrupt?
Wow, this thing's great. \n Not to brag, but I really \n think I outdid myself.
So... \n How about it, Vogo?
Tell me you aren't \n impressed by my \n ultra-fantastic Miracle Hand!
You're a salesman, \n think of the possibilities!
Think mass \n production!
I'm sure you \n grasp the potential.
This is going to \n change the world!
Is this \n a joke?
Lisa, if you have the time \n to take in rats...
You have time to \n make up the shortfall.
Do a good job, and you \n might get off with nothing \n but a reduced payment.
Pbbbt!

Around the time I started earning the trust of the people in the Banga Settlement, that shady salesman \n Vogo showed up. I didn't fully understand the power relationship, so I couldn't help myself from pointing \n out the ridiculous demands being made of the people who were beginning to accept me.
Misai: \n All preparations are go! Lower us down.
Misai: \n Figures I'd get paired with the show-off...
Misai: \n I can't believe that getup... You better take this job seriously.
Lisa: \n What are you waiting around for. Get moving!
Lisa: \n Get aboard! Every minute we waste comes out of your salary.
Lisa: \n Are you looking to forfeit your food ration?
Better stick with Misai or Lisa'll take it out on me.

Head Deeper into \n the Mining Site
That's about it for this island, on to the next!
Save the Miners
That's the last of the ore. Wait, wasn't someone in trouble?
Wasn't I already here...?
Maybe there's still some ore here.
I better grab as much ore as I can find here.
I scored big with that island!
Maybe I should go back and mine a bit more.
I barely scratched that island, it'd be a waste to leave now.
I think I've already mined this place.
I think I can still find some more ore.
Alright, time to get to work.
I filled up at that last place.
There might still be some ore back there.
So many options, it's hard to decide where to mine.
I better get back before Misai gets miffed at me.
Mine the Difficult Rock
Nevi!? I need to save those miners!
Defeat the Nevi
I need to dodge their attacks to set up a kick.
My Gravity Kick should take those flyers out.
Miner: \n They're in the sky too!
Hm? How far back did Misai go?
Find Ore to Mine
It's not very safe, but I better head further in.
Misai: \n Aagh, Scarabs!
Wasn't I here before?
Maybe I'll still find some ore here.
Nevi! It's getting dangerous this deep into the mining site.
That was a nice haul.
I could go back and mine some more.
I didn't even mine for ore back there.
I think I'm done with this island.
I might find some more ore here.
With all these Nevi, are the miners okay?
That's all for there!
Feels like I'm leaving a little behind, I could go back...
I didn't even work the island, kind of a waste...
With them gone, I'm good to get back to mining.
Back to work...
Hurry to Misai
Sorry I couldn't come faster.
Misai: \n H-How are you doing that?
Defeat the Nevi
I can't just leave Misai behind!
Miner: \n Nice! Wish I could move 'round like that.
Misai: \n This is gonna be a long day...
Misai: \n What're you doin'!?
Misai: \n Be careful!
Misai: \n Run! Go on without me!
Misai: \n I can't believe you came to help me.
Misai: \n Look out! It's a big one.
Misai: \n Unbelievable, you're goin' toe-to-toe with Scarabs.
Misai: \n Maybe you weren't lying about saving that town.
Misai: \n Get 'em, Kat!
Misai: \n That's it! Keep it up!
Misai: \n Don't let those Scarabs get the better of you!
Misai: \n You wiped every last one of 'em out!
Gems
Well, I've mined here enough. Time to move on!
Hmm, I should head further in.
Miner: \n Amazing!
Miner: \n Unbelievable, you kicked the ore free!?
Miner: \n Work'll be done in no time.
Misai: \n Come on, stay out of the way.
Misai: \n Work somewhere else.
Misai: \n It was ready to crack before you came along.
Miner: \n Kat, you should check out another island.
Miner: \n We've got this island covered.
Miner: \n Check over on one of the other islands.
Enemies Remaining
Uh-oh, that's a big one!
Misai: \n Wh-What's happening!?
Misai: \n Are... Are we safe now?
